reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well written storyline
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy reading books based on past truths. This was well done, easy to follow and based on a true mission. If we do not learn from our mistakes, we will continue to make them. However, if we each learn to think outside the box, when necessary, then outcomes may change for the better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall, I Loved It.
reviews.reviewText: "An enemy never remains an enemy, but a man's integrity is eternal."The first quarter of this book, the dialogue and story seemed too simple, but once the big raid began, I was completely engaged. I loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Book in the Series
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding! I couldn’t put it down. The character development was amazing and kept me riveted to the story. Cant wait to start the next book in the series.

reviews.reviewerName: Pvt. W. G. Kirby Amazon Customer
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 99.9% Accurate Historical Novel.
reviews.reviewText: There are so far 4 novels in this series on WWII aviation events. Author does a superior job of weaving fictional characters with actual persons from history. This entry centers on the B-24 Liberator bomber units that attacked Ploesti, Romania in August1943. The mission was to cripple Axis oil refineries in that eastern Europe nation. Fate stepped in and the overall success of the mission goal was not achieved, but not due to lack of courage from the aircrews That's the historical fact. The fictional characters are readily believable, and the situations revealed are also believable save for the one major fact that in the long run makes this such an enjoyable work of fiction. Centered on one B-24 crew, just before take-off the copilot was taken ill, so the crew was scratched for lack of a copilot not already on the mission....Here comes the catch, and warping of the history- A member of the WASP was at the base having delivered a new B-24 from the USA. She took (with none but the 9 crew members' knowledge) over as the copilot. A woman flew a combatmission on one of the costliest US bomber raids in WWII. (History bent in the fact American women wereprohibited from flying combat and WASPS were never assigned or allowed to fly aircraft outside of the North American continent. So she should not have been there nor even be considered for the role she took in the plot. Bent History, but an OUTSTANDING story. The WASP even shows up in a referral in a later book in this series when a pilot mentioned a WASP he encounter as an instructor who was "rumored to have flown an unapproved combat mission". Just one paragraph, but neat to see the reference ! A series well worth your investigation if such is of interest. Give it a look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A superb book with the tension ratcheting up all the time. The ending nearly had me in tears. Well done, Buzz!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a great read. I love stories that reflect the best in people as well as man's no so good side

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Broke my heart
reviews.reviewText: I felt my heart racing more than once while while tree reading this book. I've heard others say the story had them in a spell. It's the first time it happened to me!I couldn't stop reading so I finished it in one night.I can't recommend this one high enough.If you like a roller coaster ride in action and for once not being able to figure out who would live and who would die , then do yourself a favor and read this book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great story well told
reviews.reviewText: I particularly liked the epilogue. It is always good to see how things turned out even if it is not always happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Started slowly but quickly drew me in to wanting to find out what happened in the end. Enjoyable book written about a little-known raid on the Romanian oil fields - partly successful, but with massive losses. A good read.

reviews.reviewTitle: Little known history woven into an amazing story.
reviews.reviewText: Historical fiction is one of my favourite genres. This book was an amazing insight into the unparalleled bravery of these men and women on both sides. Thank you Buzz for sharing this great story of a little known part of history. There the wreck of a crashed liberator on the side of a mountain range in Queensland where I live. It has its own story but with the insight brought to me in this book it makes the lives of those lost pilots that much more poignant. Great read.

reviews.reviewTitle: WWII 明るいハリウッド映画みたい
reviews.reviewText: とことんポジティブなB24機長とこれまた勢いのある女性副操縦士が颯爽と飛び、迎え撃つメッサーシュミットのパイロットは純真な家族愛の男、とお膳立てはストレート。ボンボン爆弾を落としながらも楽しく飛ぶヒコーキ。切れの良い戦闘機にB24がボロボロにされつつ両機が並んで互いに敬意を表し海面に不時着。あとはじんわりと感傷の幕が開く。ほんとのところはドイツの命綱であるルーマニアの油田を１７７機のB24で爆撃して帰還したのは８８機という大惨事を基にした小説だが、言ってみればミュージカル映画の「南太平洋」みたいな甘―い物語に仕上がっている。一服の清涼剤だった。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The is the account of one fictional crew's experience in the 1943 raid in the German oil refineries in Romania. The story is well researched and the characters have depth making this both an enjoyable action story and a book which has something to say about the impact of war on both those who served and the civilian population.I've give four stars rather than five as the dialogue and description can be a little leaden at times (and the actions of a British Naval crew at the end help the plot at the expense of realism and the traditions of that service).
